name: Speckles Drop
description:
**Designed for mobile phones, with no mobile support :/. Do not play the game in fullscreen**

This is my first personal game project, inspired by my roommates clay figures that my friends adore and by other mobile games. I created this project in the winter for something my friends would enjoy, and polished it into what it is now.

In this endless dungeon delver, you play as Speckles, a rat trying to run from a falling spike trap. Try to get as far as you can!
